summary: Frostfire is just what it sounds like, frost and fire. I made this mod mainly for fun. Great way to take out dragons from afar without have to go through a fight with them. It is an ice spike, on impact it will produce flames and most of the time it will push the body around like a rag doll.
descriptionHtml:
Frostfire is just what it sounds like, frost and fire. I made this mod mainly for fun. Great way to take out dragons from afar without have to go through a fight with them.
-=Location=-
The spell tome is located on the bar counter in The Bannered Mare at Whiterun Hold.
-=what it is=-
It is an ice spike, on impact it will produce flames and most of the time it will push the body around like a rag doll. It\'s very overpowered with each cast costing only 4 magica
author: kingxammeran
